name: The Lost Bedroom of the Woods
name_original: The Lost Bedroom of the Woods
description:
A woodland, creepy house mystery. Maybe. 

A collaborative story written in November 2022 as part of a public library teen writing program. Still in development. 

Image credit: Jacek Yerka  (Polish, b. 1952, Toruń, Poland) - Susan, 1984 from Mind Fields by Harlan Ellison, 1994, Paintings
